title.narrative: Technical Assistance - Support to the National Health Sector Programme II

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance - Support to the National Health Sector Programme II) is a component of Support to Nepal Health Sector Programme II reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £19,178,788. This component benefits Nepal, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Basic health care, Health education, Health personnel development. , with the following implementing partners: Options Consultancy Services. The start date is 01-07-2010 and the end date is 29-02-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
